author: juztas
body:
Tested with crabserver,crabtaskworker, crabclient (:+1)
Will require tests of all other service maintainers.
We can`t prevent users mixing env and it is time to move on to newer python
Tested also building full comp (:+1) and it is uploaded here: http://cmsrep.cern.ch/cmssw/comp.pre.jbalcas.jbalcas/RPMS/slc6_amd64_gcc481/

Signed-off-by: Justas Balcas justas.balcas@cern.ch
title: python2.7.6 for comp_gcc481
